Precondition: User account exists and is active
Test description:
1. Navigate the login page
2. Enter valid username
3. Enter valid password
4. Click Login button
Expected results: User is able to login to his account

Summary: Login with valid username and incorrect password
Precondition: User account exists and is active
Test description:
1. Navigate the login page
2. Enter valid username
3. Enter invalid password
4. Click Login button
Expected results:
- User is unable to login to his account
- User is prompted with "Invalid credentials" message

Precondition: User account information does not exist within the database
Test description:
1. Navigate the login page
2. Enter non existent username
3. Enter any password
4. Click Login button
Expected results:
- User is unable to login
- User is prompted with "Invalid credentials" message

Precondition:
1. User account exists and is active
2. Confirm system requirements for case sensitivity
Test description:
1. Navigate the login page
2. Enter valid username in different casing (UserName vs username)
3. Enter valid password
4. Click Login button
Expected results: User is able to login to his account

Precondition: User account exists and is active
Test description:
1. Navigate the login page
2. Enter valid username 
3. Enter password in different casing (mydarling vs MydarlinG)
4. Click Login button
Expected results:
- User is unable to login to his account
- User is prompted with "Invalid credentials" message

Precondition: User account exists and is active
Test description:
1. Navigate the login page
2. Enter valid username
3. Enter valid password
4. Press Enter key on keyboard
Expected results: User is able to login to his account

Test description:
1. Navigate the login page
2. Leave username field blank
3. Enter valid password of an existing username
4. Click Login button
Expected results:
- User is unable to login
- User is prompted with "Invalid credentials" message
- User is prompted with "Required" message under username

Precondition: User account exists and is active
Test description:
1. Navigate the login page
2. Enter valid username
3. Leave password field blank
4. Click Login button
Expected results:
- User is unable to login
- User is prompted with "Invalid credentials" message
- User is prompted with "Required" message under password

Test description:
1. Navigate the login page
2. Leave username field blank
3. Leave password field blank
4. Click Login button
Expected results:
- User is unable to login
- User is prompted with "Invalid credentials" message
- User is prompted with "Required" message under username and password fields

Summary: Succesful logout via logout button and user cannot access authenticated pages after logout
Precondition: User is logged in and logs out via button
Test description:
1. Navigate user interface
2. Click Logout button
3. After being prompted to login page, attempt to navigate to a previously accessible using URL (dashboard/index)
Expected results: User is redirected to Login page

Precondition: Confirm system requirements on session timeout
Test description:
1. Log in
2. Stay idle until session timeout
2. Attempt any action (access item, reload page)
Expected results: User is logged out automatically and redirected to login page upon action

Precondition: OrangeHRM app is open in multiple tabs
Test description:
1. Login 
2. Open several tabs with authenticated pages
3. Log out in one tab
4. Refresh other tabs
Expected results:
- All tabs are logged out 
- All tabs are redirected to login page

Precondition: User changes password in another device/browser
Test description:
1. Log in on two devices (Device A and Device B)
2. Change password on Device A
2. Attempt to take any action on Device B
Expected results: Device B is logged out and prompted to login page
